```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
```


```{r}
vars_19 = load_variables(2019, "acs5", cache = TRUE)

vars_19
```


```{r}
oakland_data = map_dfr(list(vars_19$name), function(.x) {get_acs(
  geography = "block group",
  variables =  .x, 
  # output = "wide",
  state = "MI", 
  county = "Oakland", 
  year = 2019)})

oakland_data %>% dim()

oakland_data %>% write_rds(file.path("oakland_data.rds"))
```
